title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: g'(x)

1 point is earned for: g'(0)

1 point is earned for: g''(x)

1 point is earned for: g''(0)

g'(x) = aeax + f'(x)

g'(0) = a - 4

g''(x) = a2eax + f''(x)

g''(0) = a2 + 3
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: g'(x)

1 point is earned for: g'(0)

1 point is earned for: g''(x)

1 point is earned for: g''(0)

g'(x) = aeax + f'(x)

g'(0) = a - 4

g''(x) = a2eax + f''(x)

g''(0) = a2 + 3

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for: g'(x)

1 point is earned for: g'(0)

1 point is earned for: g''(x)

1 point is earned for: g''(0)

g'(x) = aeax + f'(x)

g'(0) = a - 4

g''(x) = a2eax + f''(x)

g''(0) = a2 + 3
